Atlas of Aidilon

  • The Feyboughs: The pristine, sunny hills where your fortunes often lie in the fickle hands of the Fey.
  • The Redweald: An ominous forest of perpetual dusk, home to all the things that go bump in the nightâ€¦
  • The Wastelands: Rocky deserts and mountains that offer only riches and death
  • The North Dale: TODO
  • The Permafrost: The icy, mountainous climate isn't the only thing here in the north that can be harsh and inhospitable.



Dracarcer's calendar year is broken up into four seasons of 100 days each, each of which begins with a holiday that often lasts a tenday:

  • The Greening (spring)
    • The Dawning Festival: a celebration of emergence from winter and the beginning of the planting season
  • Elysias (summer)
    • Shieldmeet: a competition of skill where challengers from all over compete for glory
  • The Gather (fall)
    • The Feast of the Gather: a celebration of the year's harvest
  • Calignos (winter)
    • Hearthrest: a time of resting and preparation for the cold nights ahead
